name: Metro Manager LA
description:
Metro Manager LA is a strategy simulation game about connecting communities throughout Los Angeles. Manage maintenance, security, wait time, and train capacity as you attempt to keep the riders of Los Angeles happy.



Key Features:
- Connect over 50 real communities around the Los Angeles area.
- Shuffle workers around your stations and trains to respond to maintenance and crime as it arises.
- Add new cars to an existing train to increase capacity on popular lines.
- Unlock new trains to ensure low wait times for your riders
- Complete in-demand routes to claim rewards and keep your riders happy.
